elements.name: Verify successful login with valid credentials

steps.name: I submit a login with VALID mail and VALID password
response status has SUCCESS code
the logged in user has the correct email

elements.name: Verify failing login with invalid input

steps.name: I submit a login with INVALID mail and VALID password
response status has BAD_REQUEST code due to Validation Error

elements.name: Verify failing login with invalid input

steps.name: I submit a login with EMPTY mail and VALID password
response status has BAD_REQUEST code due to Validation Error

elements.name: Verify failing login with invalid input

steps.name: I submit a login with WRONG mail and VALID password
response status has BAD_REQUEST code due to Validation Error

elements.name: Verify failing login with invalid input

steps.name: I submit a login with VALID mail and EMPTY password
response status has BAD_REQUEST code due to Validation Error

elements.name: Verify failing login with invalid input

steps.name: I submit a login with VALID mail and WRONG password
response status has UNAUTHORIZED_USER code due to Incorrect email or password

elements.name: Verify successful refresh-token with valid credentials

steps.name: I submit a login with VALID mail and VALID password
I refresh my token with VALID mail and VALID previous token
response status has SUCCESS code

elements.name: Verify failing refresh-token with invalid input

steps.name: I submit a login with VALID mail and VALID password
I refresh my token with INVALID mail and VALID previous token
response status has BAD_REQUEST code due to Validation Error

I refresh my token with EMPTY mail and VALID previous token
response status has BAD_REQUEST code due to Validation Error

I refresh my token with WRONG mail and VALID previous token
response status has BAD_REQUEST code due to Validation Error

elements.name: Verify failing refresh-token with invalid input

steps.name: I submit a login with VALID mail and VALID password
I refresh my token with VALID mail and EMPTY previous token
response status has BAD_REQUEST code due to Validation Error

elements.name: Verify failing refresh-token with invalid input

steps.name: I submit a login with VALID mail and VALID password
I refresh my token with VALID mail and INVALID previous token
response status has UNAUTHORIZED_USER code due to Incorrect email or refreshToken
I login with valid credentials
I request to list all the units
the returned units contains all the elements correctly
I select to view a VALID unit

elements.name: Verify request for booking a unit can be submitted successfully

steps.name: I choose one of the available years of the unit for booking
I try to book the SELECTED unit for the SELECTED year
response status has SUCCESS code

elements.name: Verify unit can be booked succesfully

the returned page contains 2 units in page from 60 units returned
I login with valid credentials

the returned page contains 1 units in page from 9 units returned and all units are filtered by Arabia

elements.name: Verify successful listing of units whith filtering

steps.name: I request to list the units of page number 5 for 1 units per page filtering with querry Arabia

steps.name: I login with valid credentials

elements.name: Verify valid unit is returned correctly

steps.name: I request to list all the units
I select to view a VALID unit
the returned unit contains all the elements correctly
I login with valid credentials

elements.name: Verify failure when trying to view a non existent unit

steps.name: I request to list all the units
I select to view a WRONG unit
response status has NOT_FOUND code due to Unit does not exist
I login with valid credentials

elements.name: Verify failure when trying to view a valid unit with an expired/invalid token

steps.name: I request to list all the units
I select to view a VALID unit with an EXPIRED token
response status has UNAUTHORIZED_USER code due to jwt expired
I login with valid credentials

elements.name: Verify failure when trying to view a valid unit with an expired/invalid token

steps.name: I request to list all the units
I select to view a VALID unit with an INVALID token
response status has UNAUTHORIZED_USER code due to jwt malformed
